question: Among the following species (I: Benzene, II: Cyclopentadienyl anion, III: Cyclooctatetraene, IV: Cycloheptatrienyl cation, V: Cyclobutadiene), the set which represents aromatic species is:
explanation: II (Cyclopentadienyl anion) is aromatic (6 pi e-).
IV (Tropylium cation) is aromatic (6 pi e-).
III is non-aromatic (tub shape) and V is anti-aromatic (4 pi e-).
